hero.title: Fishivo
hero.subtitle: Share your catches, discover spots, join the community. Take your place in Turkey's largest fishing social network.

features.title: The Digital Future of Fishing
features.subtitle: All the features you need for a modern fishing experience in one platform. Share your catches, discover new spots, learn from experienced anglers.

catchSharing.title: Catch Sharing and Cataloging
catchSharing.description: Document your caught fish with professional photos. Record species, size, weight and catch details. Create your personal catch catalog.

locationDiscovery.title: Location Discovery and Mapping
locationDiscovery.description: Discover the most productive fishing spots. Detailed maps containing GPS coordinates, depth information, water temperature and fish species data.

socialNetwork.title: Social Community Network
socialNetwork.description: Follow experienced anglers, guide newcomers. Join fishing groups, participate in events and build friendships.

photoGallery.title: Professional Visual Gallery
photoGallery.description: Personal gallery to showcase your most beautiful catch photos. Photo editing tools, filters and social media sharing features.

achievements.title: Achievement System and Badges
achievements.description: Improve your fishing skills and earn special badges. Rise in leaderboards, participate in prestigious tournaments.

weather.title: Weather and Fishing Forecast
weather.description: Advanced weather forecasts, wind speed, wave height and fish activity predictions. Determine the most suitable fishing times.

stats.title: Fishivo's Greatness in Numbers
stats.subtitle: The platform trusted by thousands of anglers from all over Turkey. Hundreds of new catches are shared every day, thousands of anglers share experiences.

mobile.title: Class Difference in Mobile Experience
mobile.subtitle: Native performance on iOS and Android platforms. Take your fishing experience to the next level with offline operation, push notifications, GPS integration and advanced camera features.
mobile.description: Mobile application optimized by expert developers offers low battery consumption, fast loading times and seamless user experience.

cta.title: Your Fishing Adventure Starts Here
cta.subtitle: Sign up for free and join Turkey's largest fishing community. Share your first catch, make new friendships and improve your fishing skills. The Fishivo family is waiting for you!
